channel.title: web content management on Logotyp.us
channel.description: Recent content in web content management on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Episerver Logo Episerver is a software company offering web content management, digital commerce, and digital marketing, through the Episerver Digital Experience Platform Cloud Service. In January 2021, Episerver announced that they were rebranding as Optimizely, a company they acquired in October, 2020. Source
You can download theEpiserverlogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: Episerver
item.description: Episerver is a software company offering web content management, digital commerce, and digital marketing, through the Episerver Digital Experience Platform Cloud Service. In January 2021, Episerver announced that they were rebranding as Optimizely, a company they acquired in October, 2020. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Acquia Logo Acquia is a software-as-a-service company co-founded by Dries Buytaert and Jay Batson to provide enterprise products, services, and technical support for the open-source web content management platform Drupal. Source
You can download theAcquialogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: Acquia
item.description: Acquia is a software-as-a-service company co-founded by Dries Buytaert and Jay Batson to provide enterprise products, services, and technical support for the open-source web content management platform Drupal. Source
